other_tests.findings: Confirmation of discoid lupus erythematosus (DLE) diagnosis.
Extensive erythematous, scaly plaques of clearing DLE on the scalp, ears, and neck; atrophic patches and plaques on the dorsal and palmar surfaces of both hands.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Marked improvement of lesions on both dorsal and palmar surfaces of the hands three months later.
